00021 #ifndef _FileOutput_HEADER_
00022 #define _FileOutput_HEADER_

00024 /*! \file FileOutput.h This file provides functions for writing atomic data items to a file.
00025  */
00026 
00027 #include "calvin_files/portability/src/AffymetrixBaseTypes.h"
00028 //
00029 #include <cstring>
00030 #include <fstream>
00031 #include <string>
00032 //
00033 
00034 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00035 {
00036 
00037 class FileOutput
00038 {
00039 public:
00040         /*! Writes an 8 bit integer from a big endian file.
00041         *
00042         * @param outstr The output file stream.
00043         * @param value The value to write to the file.
00044         */
00045         static void WriteInt8(std::ofstream &outstr, int8_t value);
00046 
00047         /*! Writes a 16 bit integer from a big endian file.
00048         *
00049         * @param outstr The output file stream.
00050         * @param value The value to write to the file.
00051         */
00052         static void WriteInt16(std::ofstream &outstr, int16_t value);
00053 
00054         /*! Writes a 32 bit integer from a big endian file.
00055         *
00056         * @param outstr The output file stream.
00057         * @param value The value to write to the file.
00058         */
00059         static void WriteInt32(std::ofstream &outstr, int32_t value);
00060 
00061         /*! Writes an 8 bit unsigned integer from a big endian file.
00062         *
00063         * @param outstr The output file stream.
00064         * @param value The value to write to the file.
00065         */
00066         static void WriteUInt8(std::ofstream &outstr, u_int8_t value);
00067 
00068         /*! Writes a 16 bit unsigned integer from a big endian file.
00069         *
00070         * @param outstr The output file stream.
00071         * @param value The value to write to the file.
00072         */
00073         static void WriteUInt16(std::ofstream &outstr, u_int16_t value);
00074 
00075         /*! Writes a 32 bit unsigned integer from a big endian file.
00076         *
00077         * @param outstr The output file stream.
00078         * @param value The value to write to the file.
00079         */
00080         static void WriteUInt32(std::ofstream &outstr, u_int32_t value);
00081 
00082         /*! Writes a 32 bit floating point number from a big endian file.
00083         *
00084         * @param outstr The output file stream.
00085         * @param value The value to write to the file.
00086         */
00087         static void WriteFloat(std::ofstream &outstr, float value);
00088 
00089         /*! Writes a 16 bit unicode string of fixed size from a big endian file.
00090         *
00091         * @param outstr The output file stream.
00092         * @param value The value to write to the file.
00093         * @param len The length of the string.
00094         */
00095         static void WriteString16(std::ofstream &outstr, const wchar_t *value, int32_t len);
00096 
00097         /*! Writes a 16 bit unicode string from a big endian file.
00098         *
00099         * @param outstr The output file stream.
00100         * @param value The value to write to the file.
00101         */
00102         static void WriteString16(std::ofstream &outstr, const std::wstring &value);
00103 
00104         /*! Writes an 8 bit string of fixed size from a big endian file.
00105         *
00106         * @param outstr The output file stream.
00107         * @param value The value to write to the file.
00108         * @param len The length of the string.
00109         */
00110         static void WriteString8(std::ofstream &outstr, const char *value, int32_t len);
00111 
00112         /*! Writes an 8 bit string from a big endian file.
00113         *
00114         * @param outstr The output file stream.
00115         * @param value The value to write to the file.
00116         */
00117         static void WriteString8(std::ofstream &outstr, const std::string &value);
00118 
00119     /*! Writes an 8 bit string from a big endian file with a fixed maximum size.  
00120     *   If the string length is less than maxLn then null's are appended.
00121         *
00122         * @param outstr The output file stream.
00123         * @param value The value to write to the file.
00124     * @param maxLn Maximum length of the string.
00125         */
00126     static void WriteString8(std::ofstream &outstr, const std::string &value, int32_t maxLn);
00127 
00128     /*! Writes an 16 bit string from a big endian file with a fixed maximum size.  
00129     *   If the string length is less than maxLn then null's are appended.
00130         *
00131         * @param outstr The output file stream.
00132         * @param value The value to write to the file.
00133     * @param maxLn Maximum length of the string.
00134         */
00135     static void WriteString16(std::ofstream &outstr, const std::wstring &value, int32_t maxLn);
00136 
00137         /*! Writes a blob to a file (as is; no htonl).  It is the responsibility of the caller to ensure
00138         *       the blob is in a portable form.
00139         * @param outstr The output file stream.
00140         * @param value A pointer to the blob.
00141         * @param size The size of the blob.
00142         */
00143         static void WriteBlob(std::ofstream &outstr, const void* value, int32_t size);
00144 
00145         /*! Writes a blob to a file with reserved space(as is; no htonl).  It is the responsibility of the caller to ensure
00146         *       the blob is in a portable form.
00147         * @param outstr The output file stream.
00148         * @param value A pointer to the blob.
00149         * @param data_size The size of the blob.
00150         * @param reserved_size The size of the reserved space (total size including the blob size).
00151         */
00152         static void WriteBlob(std::ofstream &outstr, const void* value, int32_t data_size, int32_t reserved_size);
00153 };
00154 
00155 }
